thread.section_title: Fine Art America Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Art America | www.fineartamerica.com
thread.title: BT
thread.title_full: Fine Art America reviewed by BT

author: BT
title: BT
text: I love their products that are printed on metal - very high quality. There were some scheduling and shipping issues that I encountered, and it was difficult to reach a single person that could help - it seems like they have some communication issues to iron out. Once I did reach a person who could be my advocate and help navigate their system(s), then things were OK, but it did take a lot of phone calls and emails on my part to resolve. Once they get a better system in place, this will be my go-to source for artwork!
